channel.title: I need a server hoster
channel.description: well the title pretty much says it. i need a server hoster because i dont have wireless internet. if you can id like it to be 24/7 but if you can only have it like 20/7 its ok. you need to be available like 1-2 times a week for updates. if you are intersested please post. if you host the server i might give you member pins once every month or we can find something you want. i cannot do paypal.

item.description:

u use tis thin caled protfowardnig!

item.title: I need a server hoster
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

You don’t need ‘wireless’ internet, it’s called a router and you can also do it through your modem.

Read full topic
